# Darwhin Gomez

**Email:** Darwhin88@gmail.com  |  **Phone:** 347-491-2955  |  **LinkedIn:** [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/darwhin)  
**Location:** New York City

## Education
**Bachelor of Technology – Computer Information Systems**  
New York City College of Technology (The City University of New York)  
GPA: 3.8  |  Expected Graduation: May 2024

## Core Skills
- .NET
- API Development
- Python
- SQL
- AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, DynamoDB)
- Azure (App Service, Functions)
- Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
- Agile/Scrum Methodologies
- Microservices Architecture
- Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
- Database Management (PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle)
- Automation & CI/CD
- Version Control (Git)

## Experience
### Volunteer IT Support and Development Intern  
**Mayor’s Office of Information Services**  
New York, NY  |  Feb 2024 – Current  
- Provide support to the helpdesk, development, and server teams.  
- Assist in providing white glove service to end users.  
- Participate in a project to restore over 400 out-of-commission devices through hardware and software updates.  
- Deploy scripts remotely to support, maintain, and troubleshoot devices and infrastructure.  
- Communicate with team members to facilitate tasks and project completions.  

### IT Instructor Assistant  
**RF CUNY, Generation USA**  
New York, NY  |  Feb 2022 – Aug 2023  
- Taught 36 lessons to over 200 learners in various IT concepts and technologies.  
- Planned and led workshops in Scripting in Linux and PowerShell.  
- Created a technical lab and documented solutions for configuring and implementing a RAID Solution in Windows 10.  
- Achieved a 96% cohort graduation rate.  

## Projects
### Financial Stocks Report Webpage  
- Developed a dynamic web application using PHP and MySQL.  
- Generated comprehensive stock reports from a database of 65,000+ records.  

### EzRental Auto Rental POS Management Application  
- Participated in a project to create a POS System for a hypothetical global auto rental agency.  
- Developed efficient SQL scripts and queries for testing and deployment.  

## Certifications
- AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate  
- AWS Certified AI Practitioner – Generative AI  
- Google Cybersecurity Certificate  
- Google Information Support Certificate
